data.description:
You and all non-Boss foes of your choice within Speed 3 are removed from the encounter, reappearing in a silent, lightless void.

While in the DEAD ZONE:

  • Characters are always Matched.
  • All foes are permanently Weakened and Disrupted.
  • Your Veilborn passive is always active.
  • When you would take Impact, you take that much Drive Stress instead.

The DEAD ZONE lasts until you take any Drive Burn, or until all foes in it are destroyed.
